timer.smartPause: Smart Pause: Click to toggle automatic pause when inactive
timer.autoStart: Auto-start: Click to toggle automatic session start
timer.continuousSessions: Continuous Sessions: Click to toggle continuous mode

team.title: Team Dashboard
team.subtitle: Monitor your team's focus status in real-time

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Configure timer durations and basic behavior
general.focusDurationDesc: How long should focus sessions last
general.shortBreakDesc: Duration for short breaks between focus sessions
general.longBreakDesc: Duration for long breaks after completing a cycle
general.dailySessionsDesc: Number of focus sessions to complete each day
general.maxSessionTimeDesc: Maximum time per session before auto-pause (default: 2 hours)

shortcuts.title: Global Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Configure keyboard shortcuts that work even when the app is in the background
shortcuts.startStopDesc: Toggle timer between start and pause states
shortcuts.deleteUndoDesc: Reset current session or undo during breaks
shortcuts.saveSessionDesc: Skip to next phase and save current progress

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Control how and when you receive notifications
notifications.desktopDesc: Show system notifications when timer completes. Browser permission will be requested when enabled.
notifications.soundDesc: Play a sound when timer phases complete

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Customize the appearance and visual style of the application
theme.themeModeDesc: Choose your preferred color theme. Auto will automatically switch between light and dark mode based on your system preferences.
theme.timerThemeDesc: Choose a color theme for your timer sessions. Some themes work only in light or dark mode.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Configure automatic behaviors and smart features
automation.autoStartTimerDesc: Automatically start the timer when manually skipping to the next session (using the skip button).
automation.allowContinuousSessionsDesc: Allow all sessions (focus, breaks, and long breaks) to continue beyond their timer duration. When enabled, you can manually decide when to move to the next phase instead of being automatically transitioned.
automation.smartPauseDesc: Automatically pause the timer during focus sessions when no mouse or keyboard activity is detected, and resume when activity resumes. Only works during focus periods, not breaks.
automation.inactivityTimeoutDesc: How long to wait before pausing during inactivity
automation.autoSaveSessionsDesc: Automatically save session data when timer completes without manual confirmation.
automation.preventInterruptionsDesc: Show confirmation dialog before allowing session resets during active focus periods.

goals.title: Weekly Goals
goals.description: Set your weekly focus time targets and productivity goals
goals.weeklyGoalDesc: Target focus time for Monday through Friday (default: 125 minutes = 5 sessions of 25 minutes). Saturday and Sunday are excluded from calculation.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Danger zone and advanced configuration options
advanced.startWithSystemDesc: Automatically start Presto when your computer boots up. The app will start minimized to the system tray.
advanced.enableAnonymousStatsDesc: Help improve Presto by sharing anonymous usage statistics. No personal data is collected.
advanced.debugModeDesc: Enable debug mode where all timers (focus, break, long break) are set to 3 seconds for rapid testing. Perfect for development and feature testing.
advanced.dangerZoneDesc: These actions are irreversible and will permanently delete your data.
advanced.resetAllDataDesc: This will permanently delete all your Pomodoro sessions, tasks, statistics, and reset all settings to default. This action cannot be undone.

updates.title: App Updates
updates.description: Manage application updates and version information
updates.automaticallyCheckUpdatesDesc: Check for new versions automatically when the app starts and every hour. You'll be notified when updates are available.
updates.includePrereleaseDesc: Also check for beta and pre-release versions. These may contain new features but could be less stable.
updates.releaseInfoDesc: Updates are distributed through GitHub releases.
updates.pleaseWait: Please wait while we check for the latest version.
